title: Bought a Runepage with IP but it isn't in my list
body:
What title states, I just purchased a runepage but when i went into my runepage pull down tab, there was no new page at the bottom, so I thought maybe it was placed in the middle of my pages but there is no blank page.  I thought maybe there was a chance it made a duplicate and I'd have to find it and change it but there was no duplicated pages.  I checked my purchase history and it shows I purchased and my IP dropped so is there some place I have to go before it shows up?

EDIT: I just joined a game and it shows rune page 15 but right before game I checked and it wasn't there, so maybe after game I'll be able to set it up.

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and see a new page as of today with a gibberish name.  Have you relogged since the purchase?  Sometimes it can help to make sure everything is in-sync.  Let me know if everything is okay!
Yes, I just restarted the client and now it shows up, not as a gibberish name :P, but as Rune Page 15 with a yellow dot by it, thank you for checking
